feature.description: For third-party to add, replace, or remove pens

feature.name: TaskSource
feature.description: Account source for Task, it may be exchange, google task, or others.

feature.name: SupportGallery
feature.description: The service has this feature must support base functions used in Gallery like getFriends , getAlbumsOf and getMedia. The meta_data tag must defined the account type of this service

feature.name: SupportContact
feature.description: The service has this feature must support base functions used in Contact like getFriends. The meta_data tag must defined the account type of this service
